education.degree: Bachelor of Business Administration - Gujarat University-KSSBM (2025)

experience_details.responsibilities: Enhanced brand visibility and audience engagement through strategic marketing and event coordination. Gained practical experience in digital marketing, campaign creation, and outreach initiatives.
Monetized projects by leveraging skills in video editing and graphic design. Continuously refined creative abilities, expanding client base with high-quality services.
Completed a two-month internship focused on lead generation and marketing analysis. Gained valuable strategic insights and practical experience in marketing operations.
